wikitext.*:
''' Desolation of Smaug''' can refer to: ==Middle-earth==
* [[Desolation of the Dragon]] or the '''Desolation of Smaug ''' the lands around Erebor and Dale during the days of [[Smaug]].

==Books==
* [[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug: Official Movie Guide]], a film tie-in photobook by [[Jude Fisher]].

==Adaptations==
*''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'', the second part of [[Peter Jackson]]'s ''[[The Hobbit (film series)]].'' 
** [[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug (extended edition)|''The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug'' (extended edition)]], a version of the film with an extra 25 minutes. 
** ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]''
*** ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack - Special Edition]]''
